text: Ultra-detailed photorealistic, 8K photo of a slim young woman with chocolate-brown hair in a high ponytail, delicate face-framing strands, and a sheer bright yellow small ribbon bow. She wears a bright yellow eyelet-lace dress (round neck, puff sleeves, gold buttons). Seated outdoors at a small round metal patio table with cup of coffee and looking to the camera with smile Background: Sun-dappled. vibrant cafe with a lush ivy-covered wall blooming with pink and red roses. Soft-focus. street scene with a vintage car and people in the distance. Bright natural light, high contrast, elegant pearl drop earrings, delicate bracelet, bold red lipstick. Vintage, dreamy, high-fashion.
